Module kivakit.core.configuration
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.configuration.settings

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.configuration.settings.Settings
  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simplifies access to configuration objects through the configuration API. For a detailed example showing how such objects are specified, see ConfigurationSet.

    Finding Settings

    The require(Class) method and related overloads find settings objects, as described in ConfigurationSet. To do this, the method first looks for the given settings object using the global Lookup. This allows settings to be overridden by the configuration API using Deployments or using a command line variable, as described below.s If the required settings object is not already registered, all settings objects are loaded from the specified package to provide a default object. Then, the lookup is retried and the result returned.

    Overriding Settings from the Command Line

    Settings can be overridden from the command line by specifying a comma-separated folder list using KIVAKIT_SETTINGS_FOLDERS environment variable. All settings from each folder in the list will be loaded and will override the default settings that might otherwise be used. 

     java -DKIVAKIT_SETTINGS_FOLDERS=my-settings-folder [...]
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
